      • update

        public UpdateResponse update(UpdateRequest request)
                      throws IngestException
        Description copied from interface: CatalogStore
        Updates a list of Metacard records. Metacard records that are not in the Catalog will not be created.
        Specified by:
        update in interface CatalogStore
        Overrides:
        update in class AbstractCswStore
        Parameters:
        request - - the UpdateRequest that includes updates to Metacard records that have been previously stored in a Source. A given Attribute name-value pair in this request must uniquely identify zero metacards or one metacard in the Source, otherwise an IngestException will be thrown.
        Returns:
        the UpdateResponse containing a List of Update objects that represent the new (updated) and old (previous) Metacard records.
        Throws:
        IngestException - if an issue occurs during the update such as multiple records were matched for a single update entry

      • query

        public SourceResponse query(QueryRequest request)
                     throws UnsupportedQueryException
        Specified by:
        query in interface Source
        Overrides:
        query in class AbstractCswSource
        Parameters:
        request - the query to execute
        Returns:
        a SourceResponse with query results and query response details
        Throws:
        UnsupportedQueryException - when the query is not understood, malformed, or not supported by a Source
